description: Lists the guest proxies for a patient, and the relationship types of those guest proxies.

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the patient record for this row. This column is frequently used to link to the PATIENT table.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: PROXY_MYPT_ID
columns.description: The MyChart account ID (WPR) of the delegate who has guest proxy access to this patient.

columns.name: PROXY_REL_C_NAME
columns.description:
Lists the relationship type of this proxy relationship


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: PROXY_UPG_STAT_C_NAME
columns.description:
Lists the current status of the guest proxy's upgrade request


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Upgrade Tickler Sent


Upgrade Requested


Upgrade Declined


Upgraded
